wordGroup: interdisciplinary studies 跨学科研究；多学科研究

sentences.en: Grable has mastered the interdisciplinary approach to teaching that we've been talking about in class.
sentences.cn: 格拉布尔已经掌握了我们在课堂上讨论过的跨学科教学方法。

sentences.en: It was a fun study to do because it was so interdisciplinary.
sentences.cn: 这是一个有趣的学习做的，因为它是如此的交叉学科。

sentences.en: [align=left]This interdisciplinary approach was backed up by an obsessive attention to detail.
sentences.cn: 这种跨领域的方式是以他对细节的极度关注作为支持的。
